page.title: 02KIRSTY'S WARDROBE.
page.content: My name is Kirsty Winter.I am an 11 year old girl.I live at 10 Devonshire Drive,Langwith,Mansfield,Notts,NG 20 9 WD.with my parents,Barbara and John and my 13 year old brother Derren. I have a great interest in young fashionwear and my parents have provided me with a satisfying wardrobe of garments of the latest styles. For day wear I usually put on a light yellow drop waist dress with white plastic shoes for going to school.When I get home from school,I change into jeans and a sweat shirt before going out.For special occasions like parties,dinners and dances,I wear my best outfit of dungarees with matching Tshirt and a bright red shoulder bag.To complete my wardrobe I have a variety of different hosiery,white ankle socks,knee socks,leg warmers and blue tights.
